definition: A large electronic display consisting of multiple screens or panels, typically used for broadcasting visual content or displaying information in public spaces such as stadiums, shopping malls, or conference centers. It is commonly employed to enhance visual experiences, provide advertising opportunities, or convey important messages to a large audience.

examples.german: Die Videowand im Einkaufszentrum zeigt Werbung.
examples.english: The video wall in the shopping center displays advertisements.

examples.german: Die Videowand auf der Messe präsentiert Produktpräsentationen.
examples.english: The video wall at the trade fair showcases product presentations.

examples.german: Die Videowand im Stadion überträgt Live-Spiele.
examples.english: The video wall in the stadium broadcasts live games.

examples.german: Die Videowand im Konferenzraum zeigt Präsentationen.
examples.english: The video wall in the conference room displays presentations.

examples.german: Die Videowand im Museum zeigt informative Videos.
examples.english: The video wall in the museum shows informative videos.
